snippet.title: Seers Isle Trailer
snippet.description:
Seers isle is narrative game set in a fantasy version of medieval northern Europe. It's coming on Steam on September 18th. Wishlist: http://store.steampowered.com/app/738650/Seers_Isle/

Seers Isle Official website: http://www.seersisle.com
Facebook page: http://facebook.com/seersisle
Follow the devs on twitter: http://twitter.com/novabox

# Seers Isle:
Seers Isle is an interactive graphic novel for PC, Mac & Linux. 
It will be released on Tuesday, September 18th 2018 on Steam and itch.io.

It’s a narrative game, set in a fantasy version of medieval northern Europe, where your choices impact the fate of a group of characters.

# Story:
A group of shaman apprentices set foot on the shores of a sacred island to be initiated to magic. As they progress through the wilderness, looking for the “Seers”, their spirit-guides, they realize they’re not alone.
Who is this strange horned woman they are seeing in their dreams?
